definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[הׂגׇה]] (Kö:i. 584) thrust away (Syr. 0awgiy remove, repel; Ar. waja0 IV. repel)—[[כַּאֲשֶׁר הׂגׇה מִן־הַמְַסִלָּה]] 2Sa 20:13 when he had thrust (him, the murdered Amasa) out of the highway (‖[[וַיַּסֵּב אֶת־עֲמָשָׂא מִן־הַמְַסִלָּה]] [[הַשָּׂדֶה]] v:2Sa 20:12).
